TextView.android:text: Where do you want to move finished downloads?

On the external storage, apps are only allowed to write into the app specific folder (e. g. '/storage/XXXX-XXXX/Android/data/net.nzbget.nzbget').

To work around this, you may choose any path on the external storage using the above buttons.

Downloads will be moved to these paths after they have finished successfully.

All downloads will be moved to the default path unless a movie or TV path is chosen, in which case movies or TV shows will be moved there instead.

Detection of movie and TV downloads is done via analysis of the download name (e. g. name of the NZB file), not via the categories attached to the download.

NOTE: This feature will only move finished downloads from the DestDir you chose in the NZBGet Settings, so don't remove your DestDir in the web interface.
